Integrate augmented reality: Sunglasses with augmented reality lenses can enhance the user's visual experience by providing additional information, such as directions, weather updates, and notifications.
Develop a charging case: A charging case can be designed to charge the sunglasses while also protecting them from scratches and dust.
Incorporate a built-in camera: Sunglasses with a built-in camera can capture memories and provide a unique perspective for photography and videography.
Introduce a magnetic charging system: A magnetic charging system can allow for easy and efficient charging of the sunglasses without the need for cables.
Develop a customizable frame: A customizable frame can allow users to choose the shape, color, and material of their sunglasses to fit their personal style.
